current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To increase the maximum penalty for unfair and deceptive practices relating to advertising of the
			 costs of air transportation.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Real Transparency in Airfares Act of 2014

short-title.#text: Real Transparency in Airfares Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , is amended by adding at the end the following:

header.#text: Increased penalties for unfair and deceptive airfare advertising practices
Penalty for violations of unfair and deceptive airfare advertising practices

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, the maximum civil penalty assessed on a person for an unfair or
			 deceptive practice in violation of

and described in section
			 399.84 of title 14, Code of Federal Regulations (or any corresponding
			 similar  regulation or ruling), shall be—

text.#text: if the person is an individual or small business concern, $2,500.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S2290 IS: Real Transparency in Airfares Act of 2014
